p: Similarly, there was a significant difference ( P < 0.05) in the suppression of parasitemia in mice treated with aqueous extracts of S. pinnata, L. mollissima, C. edulis, and S. africana compared to those of the dichloromethane extracts. Aqueous extracts of L. mollissima, C. edulis, and S. africana were more active than the dichloromethane extract while dichloromethane extract of S. pinnata was more active compared to the water extract ( Table 3).
